name: Rage Against The Zombies
description: Waves of various DUMB ZOMBIES want to be your best friends, but it looks like you would prefer to see them dead!So help yourself and use your skills to kill them all!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/8/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated to the motherboard Storage: 300 MB available space
